actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the severance pay received by individuals as a result of the consolidation, reduction, realignment, or closure of certain military and naval installations.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, the severance pay received by individuals as a result of the consolidation, reduction, realinement, or closure of specified military and naval installations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the severance pay received by individuals as a result of the consolidation, reduction, realignment, or closure of certain military and naval installations.
